LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Base_T0.label: Imperial Subjects
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Base_T0.description: Grants you access to basic Imperial technology.
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel.label: Imperial Clothing
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel.description: Allows you to create basic Imperial Clothing
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T1.label: Flakk Armour
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T1.descr: Allows you to create Imperial variants of Flak Armour
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T2.label: Carapace Armour
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T2.descr: Allows you to create Imperial variants of Carapace Armour
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T3.label: Power Armour
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Apparel_Armour_T3.descr: Allows you to create Imperial variants of Power Armour
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Wargear_Shield.label: Conversion Fields
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Wargear_Shield.descript: Allows you to create Conversion Field emitters
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Wargear_ServoSkull.desc: Allows you to create basic Servo Skulls
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Weapons_Bolt.label: Bolt Weapons
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Tech_Weapons_Bolt.descriptio: A brutally efficient weapon, the Bolter fires mass-reactive bolts at its targets, each one a self-propelled missile which explodes with devastating effectiveness after penetrating its target. The fear and awe that Bolter fire creates makes it a perfect weapon for shock troops, the hammering thunder of the guns mixing terrifyingly with the dull, wet explosions as flesh is blown apart.
